MessageSet.Msg:
Optional attribute:
It overwrites the default webservice URL in the WSDL on USDWebService port.

Optional attribute:
If specified the adapter will use the loginService(login,password,policy) method

Required attribute:
WSDL location URL. It can be remote URL or for performance purpose it can be local file. If you use local file, make sure the WSDL has the proper URL to the endpoint or specifi you own endpoint on the resource
